original_text: All these had taken strange wives: and some of them had wives by whom they had children.
korean_text: 이상은 모두 이방 여인을 아내로 맞이한 자라 그 중에는 자녀를 낳은 여인도 있었더라

sentences.original_text: All these had taken strange wives:
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 사람들은 이방 여자들을 아내로 맞이했으며:

sentences.original_text: and some of them had wives
